details:
verb
- to make known
= synonyms: denote, announce
- to serve as a means for expressing something
= example: to serve as a means for expressing something
= synonyms: carry
- to go or come after and bring or take back
= synonyms: fetch
- to take something or somebody with oneself somewhere
= synonyms: take
- to transmit or serve as the medium for transmission
= synonyms: carry
- to transmit a title or property
- to transfer to another
= synonyms: pass
